name: TriDis20
description: TriDis20 is a game solely developed by BaronKexana(@baronkexana on twitter)(started in 2020). This is to the best of my current abilities 3d tetris game incorporating most of the essential 2d tetris features(soft/hard drops, t-spins, wall kicks, holds, etc). But with a "twist" - the gamefield could be extended in the 3rd dimension by the depth slider on startup. With a wider field the flip (F) control is used to "more easily see the field"(2 units depth is the recommended for enjoyable play).
